Module org.apache.arrow.flight.core

Class NoOpFlightProducer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.arrow.flight.NoOpFlightProducer
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlightProducer
public class NoOpFlightProducer extends Object implements FlightProducer
A FlightProducer that throws on all operations.
